pages.text: $(item)The Resonator$() is the latest invention of the fabulous $(t:Sadly, this good sir disintegrated the 12th August 1913)L.P. Suyem$(). By stimulating the pineal gland, it decontorts the hyper-coholadistic-tremmarowavoids of the ultraviolet layer and makes them more accessible to the human mind.$(br)Studies have shown that this increases uncanniness by 37%.

The Resonator is activated by simply flicking the small switch in front of it. This device requires $(marked)power$(), which can be provided by $(t:A Power Cell is enough)$(item)several means$(), though these are usually Miskatonic University's Reactors, since only its professionals are able to assemble it properly.

Having this device run for an extended amount of time results in so called $(marked)Phantasma$() to appear. While most of them are harmless, some $(marked)Aberrations$() aren't, once they reach a certain level of materiality that is. This level of materiality seems to directly correlate to the intensity of resonance, the effect caused by the Resonator.

Other than tinting the ultraviolet layer visible to the observer, this devices also seems to have a soothing effect on the mentally affected, especially those of the morbidly manic kind. While this seems to have its boundaries, it is a remarkable observation nonetheless.
